summary: Def Leppard is an English rock band formed in 1976. They became famous in the 1980s with albums like "Pyromania" and "Hysteria," which sold millions and had hit songs like "Photograph" and "Love Bites." The band faced challenges, like the death of a guitarist, but continued making music. They've released many successful albums, sold over 100 million records, and were inducted into the Rock and Roll Hall of Fame in 2019. Their latest album, "Diamond Star Halos," came out in 2022 and was very well-received.
title: Def Leppard
